meanings.definition: Very soft or quiet in music.
meanings.sent1: The pianissimos notes floated gently through the room.
meanings.sent2: The pianissimos melody created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The pianissimos lullaby put the baby to sleep in no time.
meanings.sent4: The pianissimos raindrops whispered on the windowpane.
meanings.sent5: The pianissimos sound of the wind rustling the leaves was calming.

meanings.definition: A passage or piece of music to be played very softly.
meanings.sent1: The pianissimos in the score required delicate playing.
meanings.sent2: The pianissimos added a touch of elegance to the composition.
meanings.sent3: The pianissimos section was so quiet that the audience leaned in to listen.
